intro: Spermacoce stricta, commonly known as the narrowleaf bedstraw, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. The plant features small, white or pale yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a hairy texture. Spermacoce stricta is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
